testcase.classname: As an administrator, I should be able to access holiday data for staff members via API connection.
testcase.name: When a GET request is sent to the /api/holidayList endpoint with valid authorization credentials,
testcase.system-out: * The api user constructs the base url with the "admin" token...............passed * The api user sets "api/holidayList" path parameters.......................passed * The API user sends a GET request and records the response from the api refundReasonList endpoint..passed * The api user verifies that the status code is 200.........................passed * The api user verifies that the message information in the response body is "success".passed
